DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine impact phenylephrine versus ephedrine organ perfusion , woman undergo caesarean section receive spinal anaesthesia . The organ perfusion estimate measure maternal cerebral oxygenation NIRS ( Near-infrared spectroscopy ) foetal heartrate .
DOC.brief_title: The Oxygenation Brain During Caesarean Section
DOC.criteria: Healthy pregnant woman Over 18 year old ASA 12 Undergoing elective caesarean section Height 160 cm 180 cm Allergic reaction ephedrine phenylephrine High blood level bilirubin HELPP syndrome Preeclampsia ( pregnancyinduced hypertension ) Non singleton pregnancy
